N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1015.10 - Combining or grouping of claims

State Regulations

No attorney for a plaintiff or claimant shall for
purposes of settlement or payment combine or group two or more unrelated claims
or causes of action on behalf of clients and each such claim or cause of action
shall be settled or paid independently on its own merit. No attorney for a
defendant shall participate in the settlement of claims or causes of action
combined or grouped in violation of this section. Notes
